sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: Animals were cared for in compliance with the code of practice for the Care and Use of Animals for Scientific Purposes. Approval for these experiments was obtained from the Medical Ethical Committee for the Care and Use of Laboratory Animals of Pasteur Institute of Tunis (approval number: LNFP/Pro 152,012). The experimental protocols were approved by the Faculty Ethics Committee (Faculty of Sciences, Tunis, Tunisia).

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
